Crawling Pests

It sounds like you've got a crawling pest insect! Is it one of these?

  • Cabbage Worms

    This is a common pest for cabbage, kale, cauliflower, broccoli, and other members of the cabbage vegetable family.

  • Aphids

    Tiny, pear shaped, soft bodied insects up to 1/8" long.
